main.name: Ted Peters
main.bio: I am an animal loving, creative. Currently living in Austin Texas, but I have moved around the United States quite a bit. Whenever I need a breathe of fresh air or to get out of my head I like to go hiking, skateboarding, painting, or if I can cook a nice meal for friends and family I would definitely choose that over all else.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in contacting me for anything, please do so here. If you prefer to talk by phone just include your info in your message so I will get back to you as soon as possible.

resume.skillmessage: I have years of experience in kitchens filling complicated roles on the line. When the restaurant industry as a whole took a serious dive I began brainstorming solutions. I love computers and problem solving so figured why not commit to learning full stack web development. I have learned so much in the past couple months and theres still so much to discover. So far I have built functioning applications with languages like HTML5, CSS, SCSS, XML, ReactJS, NodeJS, JQuery, Javascript, MySQL, MongoDB, and I some experience with Swift.

education.description: Studied 80 hrs+ a week, in order to learn how to use specific libraries and languages to create fully functioning and responsive progressive web applications.

projects.title: Mobile Wallet
projects.category: Mobile Wallet is a Progressive Web App Example made using local storage to store financial notes without using sensitive informaton

projects.title: Gert Me Outta Here (GO'H)
projects.category: Weather and Map API application that shows users where to get out and go too.

projects.title: Employee Directory
projects.category: visual Employee Database, uses random people API for mock employees

projects.title: React Reading List
projects.category: Simple reading list application using local storage

projects.title: Mobile Trainer
projects.category: Javascript Mobile Trainer, saves workouts and gathers stats to make visual representations of progress

projects.title: Note Taker
